author: Phil Thomas, Phil Thomas
title: Coronavirus: Disgraced former Stormy Daniels lawyer Michael Avenatti released from jail over virus fears
description: Attorney being let out for 90 days – but other celebrity prisoners are not so lucky
content:
Michael Avenatti, the former lawyer for adult film star Stormy Daniels and prominent critic of Donald Trump, has temporarily been released from jail amid fears of the spread of the coronavirus in the prison system.
Avenatti was convicted in February of tryin… [+1648 chars]
